subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs minor league pitcher Scott Taylor was suspended for 50 games yesterday after a positive drug test. The suspension will start next season because the team he played for, the Class A Daytona Cubs of the Florida State League, finished its season last Sunday.
